definition: to work/to be employed
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to live/alive/living/work/workmanship
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上幹活的木匠將斧子傳給下面的夥伴。

sentences.english: Although the farm is large, my Dad has two men working for him.
sentences.chinese: 儘管農場較大，我爸爸只僱了兩個人幫他幹活。

sentences.english: Then he would stand up and clapped his hands and said that he would stop playing to continue his work.
sentences.chinese: 然後爬起來，拍拍手說，不玩了，又繼續幹活兒去了。

sentences.english: That youngster works with a will.
sentences.chinese: 這小夥子幹活有股傻勁兒。

sentences.english: But many girls end up dropping out to help with the family or earn money doing odd jobs.
sentences.chinese: 但是很多女孩還是輟學在家幹活，或者去打零工掙錢。

sentences.english: He was very busy, putting an edge on a scythe .
sentences.chinese: 他正忙着幹活，在磨一把長柄大鐮刀的刃兒。

sentences.english: When a student recently saw two workmen using a pneumatic drill outside his university.
sentences.chinese: 最近有個學生看見兩個工人在大學校門外用風鑽幹活。

sentences.english: He sweats himself to earn as much money as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他拼命幹活以掙得儘可能多的錢。

sentences.english: If he should come here, he would help us with our work.
sentences.chinese: 如果他真能來這兒的話，他會幫助我們幹活兒的。

sentences.english: One day he saw a farmer working in the field. The farmer was working very hard under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看到一位農民叔叔在炎熱的天氣下地幹活兒。

sentences.english: The girl comes to her employer's house to work on alternate days.
sentences.chinese: 這個女孩交替地去她的僱主家幹活。

sentences.english: From that time on Santiago worked alone.
sentences.chinese: 從那個時候起，桑提亞哥只是一個人幹活。

sentences.english: He touched them on the head and went on working.
sentences.chinese: 然後他摸摸他們的頭，嘿嘿笑着繼續幹活兒。

sentences.english: The children are busy as bees , helping their mother in the garden .
sentences.chinese: 孩子們忙個不停地在花園裏幫母親幹活兒。

sentences.english: Her hands were roughened by work.
sentences.chinese: 她的手由於幹活而粗糙。

sentences.english: Besides working in the fields, they also tend a rubber plantation and orchard.
sentences.chinese: 他們除了下地幹活之外，還照管橡膠園和果園。

definition: to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along
here
to make money
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
what are you doing?/what's he up to?
to go to bed/to sleep
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to handle (affairs)/to work
to play/to have fun/to hang out
honest/sincere/well-behaved/open and guileless/naive
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
there
the past few days
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
